languages.text: {n}Губы Владайма сжимаются в тонкую линию. Наконец он произносит:{/n} "Не смею перечить Вольному Торговцу. Но, Ваша Светлость, если вы передумаете... Футфол запомнит вашу щедрость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Губы Владайма сжимаются в тонкую линию. Наконец он произносит:{/n} "Не смею перечить Вольному Торговцу. Но, Ваше Благородие, если вы передумаете... Футфол запомнит вашу щедрость".

languages.text: {n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."
languages.original_text: {n}Губы Владайма сжимаются в тонкую линию. Наконец он произносит:{/n} "Не смею перечить Вольному Торговцу. Но, Ваша Светлость, если вы передумаете... Футфол запомнит вашу щедрость".

{n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

{n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは唇をギュッと結ぶ。そして長い沈黙の後に口を開いた。{/n}「自由開拓者に逆らうつもりはない。しかし陛下、考え直したほうがいい…フットフォールで、君の懐の深さは記憶に刻まれるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは唇をギュッと結ぶ。そして長い沈黙の後に口を開いた。{/n}「自由開拓者に逆らうつもりはない。しかし陛下、考え直したほうがいい…フットフォールで、君の懐の深さは記憶に刻まれるだろう」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆将嘴唇抿成了一条细线。他停顿了很久，之后说开了口。{/n}“我不敢违逆行商浪人的意愿。不过，大人，如果您愿意重新考虑的话……落脚港会记住您的仁慈。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆将嘴唇抿成了一条细线。他停顿了很久，之后说开了口。{/n}“我不敢违逆行商浪人的意愿。不过，大人，如果您愿意重新考虑的话……落脚港会记住您的仁慈。”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym condensa los labios en una única y fina línea. Después de una larga pausa, dice:{/n} «No me atrevería a contrariar a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. Pero si {mf|milord|milady} cambiara de parecer... Paso no olvidaría su generosidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym condensa los labios en una única y fina línea. Después de una larga pausa, dice:{/n} «No me atrevería a contrariar a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente. Pero si {mf|milord|milady} cambiara de parecer... Paso no olvidaría su generosidad».

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres serrées, Vladaym garde le silence un long moment, puis déclare :{/n} « Je n'oserais jamais défier {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, mais si jamais vous veniez à changer d'avis, Votre Seigneurie... Castel saurait se rappeler votre mansuétude. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres serrées, Vladaym garde le silence un long moment, puis déclare :{/n} « Je n'oserais jamais défier {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, mais si jamais vous veniez à changer d'avis, Votre Seigneurie... Castel saurait se rappeler votre mansuétude. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strich zusammen. Nach einer langen Pause sagt er:{/n} "Ich würde es nicht wagen, mich gehen {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} aufzulehnen. Aber, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, solltet Ihr Eure Meinung ändern ... wird Footfall sich immer an Eure Großzügigkeit erinnern."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strich zusammen. Nach einer langen Pause sagt er:{/n} "Ich würde es nicht wagen, mich gehen {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} aufzulehnen. Aber, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, solltet Ihr Eure Meinung ändern ... wird Footfall sich immer an Eure Großzügigkeit erinnern."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın sıktığı dudakları ince bir çizgiye dönüşüyor. Uzun bir duraklamanın ardından söze giriyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'e karşı gelmeye cüret edemem. Yine de tekrar düşünün derim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Binliman, yüce gönüllülüğünüzü unutmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym presses his lips into a thin line. After a long pause, he says,{/n} "I wouldn't dare defy a Rogue Trader. But, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, should you reconsider... Footfall will remember your magnanimity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym dişlerini sıkıyor ve uzun bir duraklamadan sonra konuşabiliyor ancak.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'e karşı gelmeye cesaret edemem ama tekrar düşünün {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Binliman yüce gönüllülüğünüzü hatırlayacaktır."
